Environment variables example:
CMAKE_C_COMPILER C:\Cygwin64\bin\gcc.exe
CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER C:\Cygwin64\bin\g++.exe
CMAKE_ROOT D:\Programmation\Tools\CMake\share\cmake-3.2

Cmake variables example:
PROTOBUF_INCLUDE_DIR D:\Programmation\Tools\protobuf\src
PROTOBUF_LIBRARY D:\Programmation\Tools\protobuf\cmake\build\Release\libprotobuf.lib
PROTOBUF_LIBRARY_DEBUG D:\Programmation\Tools\protobuf\cmake\build\Debug\libprotobufd.lib
PROTOBUF_PROTOC_EXECUTABLE D:\Programmation\Tools\protobuf\cmake\build\Release\protoc.exe
